inlineContent.text: DotFaceLite provides components for face capture and related functionalities which are easy to integrate into an iOS application.

abstract.text: UI component for capturing face images using the placeholder.
Customization options for the MagnifEye liveness user interface.
Customization options for the face auto capture user interface.
Configuration options for the MagnifEye liveness process.
Validate if a value belongs to an interval.
Configuration of the face auto capture non-UI component.
Stateless class which can detect faces in an image.
UI component for capturing images suitable for MagnifEye liveness evaluation.
Presets for the quality attributes thresholds of the face auto capture result.
Validate maximum pitch angle of the device.
Class responsible for the localization of user interface strings.
Non-UI component for the face auto capture process.
The result returned from the processing of one image during the face auto capture process.
Four detected corners in an image.
Validate if a value belongs to an interval.
Configure thresholds for the quality attributes of the face auto capture result.

Raw image with BGR888 pixel format.

Raw image with BGRA8888 pixel format.
Class responsible for the initialization of DOT libraries -
Phase of the face auto capture process.
Static class responsible for generating logs. You can configure log level.
Configuration options for the face auto capture process.
Facing of the camera on the device.
Indicates how the layer displays video frames.
The data sample captured at specific time which serves as an input for the face auto capture process.
